rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language describing actions ('made... available', 'support efforts to safeguard').
The segment reports on protective equipment and funding being made available.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports actions taken (made equipment/funding available) without explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
